description: simple tool to install deb files - GNOME GUI
details:
gdebi lets you install local deb packages resolving and installing
 its dependencies. apt does the same, but only for remote (http, ftp)
 located packages.

 This package contains the graphical user interface.
 protocol::ftp, protocol::http, role::program, scope::utility,
 suite::debian, uitoolkit::gtk, use::downloading,
 works-with::software:package, x11::application
